name: Lords of the Realm 2
description:
Lords of the Realm 2 is a strategy game developed by Impressions Software. It was originally released in 1996. It was published by Sierra On-Line. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Lords of the Realm 2 on PC.
Eric Ouellette produced the game. It was directed by Chris Beatrice. It was scored by Keith Zizza.
